name: GetZoomUserActivityLogs
description:
Retrieve Zoom user sign in and sign out activity reports.

Use this tool to obtain a list of sign in and sign out activity logs for users under a Zoom account. Useful for tracking account activity and ensuring compliance with organizational policies. Requires a Pro or higher Zoom plan.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for the activity logs report, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be within the last six months.

value_schema.description: Start date for which you would like to view the activity logs report. Using the `from` and `to` parameters, specify a monthly date range for the report as the API only provides one month worth of data in one request. The specified date range should fall within the last six months.

parameters.name: end_date_for_activity_logs
parameters.description: The end date up to which to view the activity logs report. Must specify within the last six months.

value_schema.description: End date up to which you would like to view the activity logs report.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of activity log records to retrieve in one API call. Adjust for batch processing of data.

value_schema.description: The number of records to be returned within a single API call

parameters.name: pagination_next_page_token
parameters.description: Token used for paginating through large sets of user activity logs. Use the token received from the previous response to access the next set of results.

value_schema.description: Next page token is used to paginate through large result sets

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date for which you would like to view the activity logs report. Using the `from` and `to` parameters, specify a monthly date range for the report as the API only provides one month worth of data in one request. The specified date range should fall within the last six months.

value_schema.description: Start date for which you would like to view the activity logs report. Using the `from` and `to` parameters, specify a monthly date range for the report as the API only provides one month worth of data in one request. The specified date range should fall within the last six months.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date up to which you would like to view the activity logs report.

value_schema.description: End date up to which you would like to view the activity logs report.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records to be returned within a single API call

value_schema.description: The number of records to be returned within a single API call

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Next page token is used to paginate through large result sets

value_schema.description: Next page token is used to paginate through large result sets

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
